price: Dan beberapa ahli sihir itu datang kepada Firʻawn  mengatakan, "(Apakah) sesungguhnya kami akan mendapat upah, jika kamilah yang menang?"
arabic: وَجَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ فِرۡعَوۡنَ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wajāa al-saḥaratu fir'ʿawna qālū inna lanā la-ajran in kunnā naḥnu al-ghālibīna
